title: Bloomberg Markets: Gurman on What's New in the iPhone8
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Gurman on What's New in the iPhone8
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Mark Gurman Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Apple's iPhone8, due out this fall, the new smartphone arrives with lofty expectations.
